TEXT: We should not give up our faith in looking forward to a possibility, a conincidence, a miracle—— NL ——just like the born of civilization
Wooow, there are a gang of vampire coming for us
“I have realized more and more things that are on your shoulder” you point your claws to the comer.
We shall not stop reminiscing those past things, those storys, those history—— NL ——For they have wittnessed the evolution of the civilization
